description: Manage the Telegram Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot telegram create
commands.summary: Create the Telegram Channel on a bot.
commands.syntax:
az bot telegram create --access-token
                       --name
                       --resource-group
                       [--add-disabled {false, true}]
                       [--is-validated {false, true}]
                       [--location]
examples:
az bot telegram create -n botName -g MyResourceGroup --access-token token
--is-validated

commands.name: az bot telegram delete
commands.summary: Delete the Telegram Channel on a bot.

commands.name: az bot telegram show
commands.summary: Get details of the Telegram Channel on a bot.
